title: Rav Hirsch Meets with MKs
body: Rav Moshe Hillel Hirsch met with Degel HaTorah reps to discuss supporting the Israeli gov't's draft law or heading to new elections, with MKs Moshe Gafni and Uri in attendance.

title: Rabbi Avi Schnall Wins Big
body: Rabbi Avi Schnall secures reelection in the New Jersey General Assembly, backed by strong Lakewood-area support and record early voting turnout.

title: Tefillah Gathering for Rav Shmuel Yaakov
body: A tefillah gathering was held in Meah Shearim's Toldos Avrohom Yitzchok court for Rabbi Shmuel Yaakov ben Yenta, who remains hospitalized in serious but improving condition. Fervent tefillos were said for the Rebbe's recovery.

title: Rabbi Shmuel Ellenbogen Wins
body: Rabbi Shmuel "Sam" Ellenbogen of Toms River, NJ, becomes the first Orthodox Jew elected to Ocean County's Board of Commissioners, marking a historic victory.
